Title: Plaguebearers
Legend: Plaguebearers trudge to battle amidst the drone of flies’ wings and endless counting. These daemons tally the diseases unleashed upon the realms, all the while stabbing and hacking at their enemies with filthy plagueswords.
Intro: This unit is referred to as a Plaguebearer Host. Each model in a Plaguebearer Host is armed with a Plaguesword.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Tallyband of Nurgle • Invidian Plaguehost

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Plagueridden. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Plaguesword.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. If the unmodified battleshock roll for a unit that includes any Icon Bearers is 1, you can return 1 slain model to that unit and no models in that unit flee in that battleshock phase.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Piper. Re-roll battleshock rolls of 1 for enemy units that are within 6" of any friendly Pipers.

Rules.Name: Cloud Of Flies
Rules.Fluff: Plaguebearer tallybands are surrounded at all times by blinding swarms of daemon-flies.
Rules.Rule: Cloud of Flies: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target this unit while it has 5 or more models.
